endorsementsList.name: Neeraj
endorsementsList.message: I wholeheartedly endorse Kotadurga as a highly skilled and reliable DevOps Engineer. With hands-on expertise in Terraform, AWS, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Docker, and Ansible, he consistently demonstrates the ability to automate and optimize enterprise-scale cloud environments. His work in CI/CD pipeline design, containerization, and cloud infrastructure automation has directly improved reliability, scalability, and delivery speed in complex telecom and enterprise systems.

endorsementsList.name: Mahesh
endorsementsList.message: Kotadurga is a skilled DevOps Engineer who excels in automating cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines.His expertise in Kubernetes, Docker, and Terraform ensures scalable, reliable deployments across enterprise systems.A proactive problem-solver, he consistently drives efficiency, resilience, and long-term improvements in every project.
